column4: my mouse has randomly stopped working twice today. what could be going wrong?
what brand and model is it usb?
what should i look for in the dmesg?
i have no idea what a ring buffer is :(. i tried grepping 'touchpad' and some other variants but got nothing :(
ok, i found it, now hwo do i interpret what's there?
lol. how do i copy from the terminal? :|
what about if mouse is not working? :|
if you find it tell me please
a possibly important thing: i was working with libreoffice calc and a very memory demanding spreadsheet. i have 3gb ram and an underpowered e-350
you have restarted the machine right?
nope. if i restart it the problem goes away for a second, but it will most likely come back (already hapened a couple times as i told you before)
I think that ir most likely is a faulty touchpad
do you have a spare usb mouse?
if only the usbs were working right....
i'll have to drive this piece of garbage to service. hopefully i'll get it fixed (or replaced). thankfully the hdd is intact :)
thanks for helping me understand the problem. good bye
